dialog.title: User Guide
dialog.description: Recommended steps for taking photos with our app

background.title: Background
background.description: Ensure the background is clean and monochromatic.

exposure.title: Exposure
exposure.description: Ensure the exposure is set at a distance that fits the user into the frame.

cameraAngle.title: Camera Angle
cameraAngle.description: Ensure the camera angle is central and straight.
